alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 5:08AM EDT until March 31 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River near Griffin affecting Fayette and Spalding Counties. Flint River near Thomaston affecting Talbot and Upson Counties. Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville affecting Crawford, Upson, Talbot and Taylor Counties. Flint River below Big Branch near Molena affecting Pike and Meriwether Counties. For the Flint River Basin...including Lovejoy, Peachtree City, Fayetteville, Americus, Peachtree City, Woolsey, Sharpsburg, Peachtree City, Peachtree City, Senioa, Griffin, Griffin, Orchard Hill, Molena, Thomaston, Carsonville, Montezuma, Byromville... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 34.4 feet and cresting. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 35.7 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 18 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
